data.text: @chrisha_jay @BromptonBicycle I cycle as well as run but as a form of transport . Whereas I have friends who cycle 70-80 miles in a morning for fun, I rarely do more than 20-30 miles and as a way of commuting, shopping etc. cycling is fun but I find the traffic is scary and try to keep to quiet routes
@chrisha_jay @BromptonBicycle We’re here!! Got a Raleigh hybrid
@chrisha_jay @BromptonBicycle Amazing. Cycling is great. 👏🏾👏🏾👏🏾. I have a Brompton too, one of my 4 bicycles.
@chrisha_jay @BromptonBicycle Ah that’s awesome Chrissy! @DrSimonHodes is obsessed with his Brompton bike 😂
